comments.content: The closest I have is [Calibre](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112406/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.klim.co.nz/retail-fonts/calibre). All letters look pretty close (if not matching) except for /a. As I was unable to find it even with the [complete character map](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112406/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.klim.co.nz/yk-files/4b971d4f29818ea67f2d622c1567f8cc/Klim-Calibre.pdf), it may have been customized.

Grafik magazine was composed with ITC Avant Garde Gothic  
 [http://www.linotype.com/fr/563/itcavantgardegothic-famille.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112406/http:/www.linotype.com/fr/563/itcavantgardegothic-famille.html)

I still don't know if it has been based on Calibre, at least it resembles it now. What I know though is it can't be Avant-Garde to me or it has been so customized nothing has been left from it. All letters are off.
